content.question: Which of the following best describes the genotype of the individual identified with an asterisk in the pedigree in Figure 1 ?

choices.label: Two dominant <math alttext="A L A S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>S</mi><mn mathvariant="italic">2</mn></mrow></math> alleles
Two recessive <math alttext="A L A S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>S</mi><mn mathvariant="italic">2</mn></mrow></math> alleles

One dominant <math alttext="A L A S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>S</mi><mn mathvariant="italic">2</mn></mrow></math> allele and one recessive <math alttext="A L A S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>S</mi><mn mathvariant="italic">2</mn></mrow></math> allele

One recessive <math alttext="A L A S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>S</mi><mn mathvariant="italic">2</mn></mrow></math> allele and no second allele for the <math alttext="A L A S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>S</mi><mn mathvariant="italic">2</mn></mrow></math> gene

content.answer: One dominant <math alttext="A L A S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>S</mi><mn mathvariant="italic">2</mn></mrow></math> allele and one recessive <math alttext="A L A S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>S</mi><mn mathvariant="italic">2</mn></mrow></math> allele

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
